summary: It's a Glasssword with paralysis enchantment
descriptionHtml:
The sword is 2x fastrer than a normal Glasssword and has an attack damage of 40 (without skill).
It also paralysis your enemies.  

-craftable and upgradeable

Installation: 
Put the Killbane_sword.esb into your Data folder.

Have fun with the mod and pls don't judge me it's my first mod.

[color=#00ff00]Also feel free to try my new Mod:[/color]
